thread.title: No One Was More Proud of Beyoncé at the Grammys Than Jay Z and Blue Ivy
thread.title_full: No One Was More Proud of Beyoncé at the Grammys Than Jay Z and Blue Ivy

author: Kelsie Gibson
title: No One Was More Proud of Beyoncé at the Grammys Than Jay Z and Blue Ivy
text:
Jay Z and Blue Ivy Reacting to Beyonce's Grammys Performance No One Was More Proud of Beyoncé at the Grammys Than Jay Z and Blue Ivy February 12, 2017 by Kelsie Gibson 0 Shares 
Beyoncé completely slayed at the Grammy Awards on Sunday night, but one of the cutest moments had to be her family's reaction after her performance. After giving a moving medley of "Love Drought" and "Sandcastles" from her Grammy-nominated album Lemonade , her husband, Jay Z, and their daughter, Blue Ivy, just couldn't contain their joy as they gave her a standing ovation. Not only did Blue — who was perfectly dressed as the late Prince — look so proud of her mom , but Jay Z even looked like he had a tear in his eye. Aww!
